column3: there was a Beast.He was a Great Beast
column4: and lived in a Great Castle that stood in the middle of a Great Park
column5: and everybody in the country held the Beast in great fear. In fact everything about the Beast was great; his roar was great and terrific and could be heard for miles around the park
column6: and when he roared the people trembled.Nobody ever saw the Beast
column7: which was by no means remarkable
column8: for the Beast never came out of his Park
column11: ever ventured on to his estate.But matters were not allowed to remain like this for ever
column12: for something very wonderful happened to the Beast and to somebody else
column13: and if that something had not happened this story would never have been written.
